## Aufgabe: DENSITY

### Univariate Analyse

```{r table_1, echo=TRUE}
summary(trees)
```

```{r fig_1, echo=TRUE}
plot(density(trees$Girth)) # leicht rechtsschief (Median < Mean)
```

```{r fig_2, echo=TRUE}
plot(density(trees$Height)) # annähernd normalverteilt (Median = Mean)
```

```{r fig_3, echo=TRUE}
plot(density(trees$Volume)) # rechtsschief und mehrgipflig (Median < Mean)
```
